news.title: Yahoo Is Deleting All Content Ever Posted to Yahoo Groups
news.description: After close to 20 years of operation, Yahoo Groups is shutting down, and users have until mid-December to save any content they have posted to the site.

news.title: Zuckerberg Defends Facebook’s ‘Free Expression’ in Face of Washington Hostility
news.description: In a recent speech at Georgetown University, the Facebook CEO defended the company’s somewhat permissive stance toward seemingly misleading campaign ads.

news.title: Twitter Explains What It Would Take for Trump’s Account or Tweets to be Deleted
news.description: Twitter has outlined six areas in which transgressions by any account holder, including a political leader, can lead to account action including removal.

news.title: EU Nations Can Force Facebook to Remove Content Worldwide, Court Rules
news.description: Europe’s highest court has ruled that social media platforms must seek to identify illegal content, and must block it globally if any country’s government requests it.
